compatibility.notes: The CNRI-Jython license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses that impose stricter distribution terms.

key_requirements: Include CNRI's copyright notice in the Software and any derivative versions.
State changes made to the Software in any derivative work.
Do not use CNRI trademarks in a trademark sense to endorse or promote products or services.
license.name: CNRI-Jython
obligations: Retain CNRI's copyright notice in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
Indicate the nature of modifications made to the Software in any derivative work.
Display the CNRI License Agreement or a prominent notice regarding the license terms in derivative works.
